name: OpenDocument Drawing Document Format (ODG), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
definition: An XML-based format for editable graphics documents, usually with .odg as file extension.   Part of the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family.  Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.  Component files are packaged using a constrained version of the ZIP format.  Incorporates an XML-based manifest file to list component files.
